item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

The post is dominated by download, thus deserves to be in the download section. And about the rules being memorized, the picture rule shouldn’t have to be read to know it, it’s a given. Repost it in the downloads section with pictures and a description, or this it’s just spam.

item.description:
@noobie22 wrote:

item.title: A web client that every can use!
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“noobie22, post:5, topic:259613”]No problem, See why I deserve HIDDEN admin?[/quote]You’re completely ignorant to how stupid this post is.

For one, This isn’t the downloads section. Two:[quote=“noobie22, post:3, topic:259613”]Or SILAB? NO. It doesn’t need pictures, as it’s not a tutorial.[/quote]No one said it was a tutorial, this is obviously a download. And if you even were smart enough to post it in the correct section, it would in fact need pictures. Three, no one needs more webclients (if this were a webclient), especially one not recognized already.

Read full topic
